life_path.definition: Most important; derived from birth date
life_path.calc: Reduce birth date (YYYY+MM+DD) to single digit, keep 11/22/33 as master numbers

expression_destiny.calc: Pythagorean sum of all letters in your full birth name

soul_urge.definition: Derived from vowels in your full name
soul_urge.calc: Pythagorean sum of vowels only in your full birth name

personality.definition: Derived from consonants in your full name
personality.calc: Pythagorean sum of consonants only in your full birth name

birthday.definition: Day of the month you were born
birthday.calc: Day of the month you were born (1-31)

maturity.definition: Derived from Life Path + Expression Number

current_name.definition: From the name you go by today (can change over time)
current_name.calc: Pythagorean sum of all letters in your current display name
